level.heading: Deposit of fees and moneys into General Fund.
level.text: All moneys derived from the sale or assignment of any property, real or personal, shall be deposited in the Local Transportation Fund as established by § 9-111.01a.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: District of Columbia General Fund, see § 50-2603.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-175 rewrote the section which had read as follows: "All fees and other moneys collected under this subchapter, including all fees collected pursuant to §§ 50-2632 and 50-2633, and all moneys derived from the sale or assignment of any property, real or personal, shall be deposited in the General Fund of the District of Columbia as established by the Revenue Funds Availability Act of 1975."
D.C. Law 18-370 substituted "Local Transportation Fund" for "Local Roads Construction and Maintenance Fund".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 627 of Fiscal Year 2011 Supplemental Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-694, January 19, 2011, 58 DCR 662).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-42
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1501.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-370
level.text: For history of Law 18-370, see notes under § 50-921.10.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 629 of D.C. Law 18-370 provided: "Sec. 629. Applicability. This subtitle shall apply as of October 1, 2011; except, that sections 622 and 623(a)(2) shall apply as of the effective date of this act."
